Title: Comparative Analysis of Classical and Quantum Plasmons in Graphene Nanostructures
Source: IEEE Photonics Soc. Summer Top. Meet. Ser., SUM
Abstract: © 2018 IEEE.We investigate the physical properties of classical and quantum plasmons in graphene nanostructures using finite-difference time-domain computations and time-dependent density functional theory, respectively. The results show that the optical properties of quantum plasmons are markedly different from those of classical ones, both qualitatively and quantitatively.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
